wording: Do you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if the woman wants it for any reason?
short_label: Abortion should be legal for any reason

wording: Do you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if there is a strong chance of serious defect in the baby?
Do you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if the woman's own health is seriously endangered by the pregnancy?
Do you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if she is married and does not want any more children?
Do you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if the family has a very low income and cannot afford any more children?
Do you personally think it is wrong for a woman to have an abortion if the family has a very low income and cannot afford any more children.
short_label: Abortion due to poverty is wrong

wording: Do you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if she became pregnant as a result of rape?
Do you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtain a legal abortion if she is not married and does not want to marry the man?
Even if it brings no immediate benefits - scientific research that advances the frontiers of knowledge is necessary and should be supported by the federal government.

Some people say that because of past discrimination - blacks should be given preference in hiring and promotion. Others say that such preference in hiring and promotion of blacks is wrong because it discriminates against whites. What about your opinion - are you for preferential hiring and promotion of blacks?
short_label: Preferential hiring of Blacks is good

wording: America should follow its own interests - even if this leads to conflicts with other nations.
short_label: US should forcefully seek its interests

wording: American television should give preference to American films and programs.
short_label: TV should prioritize US films & shows

wording: Do you favor the death penalty for persons convicted of murder?
Those in need have to learn to take care of themselves and not depend on others.
short_label: Those in need must learn self-reliance

wording: Religious leaders should not try to influence how people vote in elections.

There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance: somebody who is against all churches and religion -- should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university?
Consider a man who admits he is a Communist. Suppose he is teaching in a college. Should he be fired?
Consider a man who admits that he is a homosexual. Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university?
Consider a person who advocates doing away with elections and letting the military run the country. Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university?
short_label: Allow teacher who is pro-military coup

wording: Now consider a Muslim clergyman who preaches hatred of the United States. Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university?
short_label: Muslim hateful of USA can be teacher

wording: Consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university?
short_label: Race science proponent, teach at Univ.

wording: It is much better for everyone involved if the man is the achiever outside the home and the woman takes care of the home and family.
short_label: Man work, woman home–best for all

wording: Because of past discrimination employers should make special efforts to hire and promote qualified women.
short_label: Extra effort to hire qualified women

wording: Some people say that because of past discrimination women should be given preference in hiring and promotion. Others say that such preference in hiring and promotion of women is wrong because it discriminates against men. What about your opinion - are you for preferential hiring and promotion of women?
short_label: Preferential hiring of women is good

wording: Foreigners should not be allowed to buy land in America.
short_label: Shouldn’t let foreigners buy US land

wording: Do you think the use of marijuana should be made legal?
On the whole - do you think it should be the government's responsibility to impose strict laws to make industry do less damage to the environment?
short_label: Govt. should impose strict envir. laws

wording: Would you favor a law which would require a person to obtain a police permit before he or she could buy a gun?
short_label: Buying gun should require police permit

wording: Some people think that African-Americans have been discriminated against for so long that the government has a special obligation to help improve their living standards. Others believe that the government should not be giving special treatment to African-Americans. Do you think that the government should help improve the living standards of African-Americans?
short_label: Govt. should improve lives of Afr. Am.

wording: Some people think that the government in Washington should do everything possible to improve the standard of living of all poor Americans. Other people think it is not the government's responsibility and that each person should take care of himself. Do you think that the government should do everything possible to improve the standard of living of all poor Americans?
short_label: Govt. should raise living stds of poor

wording: In general some people think that it is the responsibility of the government in Washington to see to it that people have help in paying for doctors and hospital bills. Others think that these matters are not the responsibility of the federal government and that people should take care of these things themselves. Do you think that it is the responsibility of the government?
short_label: Govt. should help pay for health care

wording: What about sexual relations between two adults of the same sex--do you think it is always wrong?
A man's job is to earn money - a woman's job is to look after the home and family.
short_label: Men should work, women domestic duties

wording: People should support their country even if the country is in the wrong.
short_label: Should support one’s country, even if wrong

wording: When a person has a disease that cannot be cured -- do you think doctors should be allowed by law to end the patient's life by some painless means if the patient and his family request it?

There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance somebody who is against all churches and religion. If some people in your community suggested that a book he wrote against churches and religion should be taken out of your public library -- would you favor removing this book?

Consider a man who admits he is a Communist. Suppose he wrote a book which is in your public library. Somebody in your community suggests that the book should be removed from the library. Would you favor removing it?

Consider a man who admits that he is a homosexual. If some people in your community suggested that a book he wrote in favor of homosexuality should be taken out of your public library -- would you favor removing this book?

Consider a person who advocates doing away with elections and letting the military run the country. Suppose he wrote a book advocating doing away with elections and letting the military run the country. Somebody in your community suggests that the book be removed from the public library. Would you favor removing it?

Consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. If some people in your community suggested that a book he wrote which said Blacks are inferior should be taken out of your public library -- would you favor removing this book?
short_label: Remove library book with racist claims

wording: Would you be in favor of having a close relative or family member marry an Asian American person?
Would you be in favor of having a close relative or family member marry a black person?
Would you be in favor of having a close relative or family member marry a Hispanic American person?
Homosexual couples should have the right to marry one another.
People who want children ought to get married.
Would you be in favor of having a close relative or family member marry a white person?
Ethnic minorities should be given government assistance to preserve their customs and traditions.

In general - would you say that people should obey the law without exception rather than there are exceptional occasions on which people should follow their consciences even if it means breaking the law?
People should be willing to help others who are less fortunate.
short_label: People should help the less fortunate

wording: Do you agree that methods of birth control should be available to teenagers between the ages of 14 and 16 if their parents do not approve?
Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who had said vulgar and obscene things to the policeman?
short_label: Ok for police to strike person cursing

wording: Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who was attacking the policeman with his fists?
short_label: Ok for police to strike back if punched

wording: Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who was attempting to escape from custody?
short_label: Ok for police to strike if person flees

wording: Are there any situations you can imagine in which you would approve of a policeman striking an adult male citizen?
short_label: Police may sometimes hit male citizens

wording: Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who was being questioned as a suspect in a murder case?
short_label: Ok for police to strike a susp. murderer

wording: Consider your feelings about pornography laws. Do you think it should be illegal?
There's been a lot of discussion about the way morals and attitudes about sex are changing in this country. If a man and woman have sex relations before marriage -- do you think it is wrong?
Suppose there is a community-wide vote on the general housing issue. There are two possible laws to vote on (OWNER DECIDES and CAN'T DISCRIMINATE). Would you vote for owner decides?
short_label: Ok to discriminate when selling house

wording: Would you be for sex education in the public schools?
short_label: Support sex ed. in public schools

wording: Do you agree that it is sometimes necessary to discipline a child with a good hard spanking?
Consider somebody who is against all churches and religion. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your (city/town/community) against churches and religion -- should he be allowed to speak?
Consider a man who admits he is a Communist. Suppose this admitted Communist wanted to make a speech in your community. Should he be allowed to speak?
Consider a man who admits that he is a homosexual? Suppose this admitted homosexual wanted to make a speech in your community. Should he be allowed to speak?
Consider a person who advocates doing away with elections and letting the military run the country. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your community -- should he be allowed to speak?

Now consider a Muslim clergyman who preaches hatred of the United States. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your community preaching hatred of the United States - should he be allowed to speak?
short_label: Allow Muslim to preach hatred of USA

wording: Consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your community claiming that Blacks are inferior -- should he be allowed to speak?
short_label: Allow speech by race science proponents

wording: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has an incurable disease?
short_label: Terminally ill have right to suicide

wording: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has gone bankrupt?
short_label: Bankrupt person has right to suicide

wording: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has dishonored his or her family?
short_label: Right to suicide if dishonored family

wording: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person is tired of living and ready to die?
short_label: Right to suicide when ready to die

wording: Consider people who are in their early teens -- say 14 to 16 years old. In that case: do you think sex relations before marriage are wrong?
short_label: Premarital sex wrong for early teens

wording: Both the husband and the wife should contribute to the household income.
short_label: Both husband & wife should have incomes

wording: Irish and Italians and Jewish and many other minorities overcame prejudice and worked their way up. Blacks should do the same without special favors.
For certain problems - like environmental pollution - international bodies should have the right to enforce solutions.
What is your opinion about a married person having sexual relations with someone other than the marriage partner--is it wrong?
Do you think that the American government should have the right to keep people under video surveillance in public areas?
It is alright for a couple to live together without intending to get married.

short_label: USA should comply with intl. org.

wording: Do you think that the American government should have the right to monitor e-mails and any other information exchanged on the Internet?
People should take care of themselves and their families first, before helping other people.
short_label: Primary duty is to help self and family

wording: Do you think that the American government should have the right to collect information about anyone living in other countries without their knowledge?
short_label: US may spy on people in other countries

wording: Do you think that the American government should have the right to collect information about anyone living in America without their knowledge?

wording: People who are better off should help friends who are less well off.

short_label: Duty to care for one’s aging parents

wording: Some people say that it is better for a country if different racial and ethnic groups maintain their distinct customs and traditions. Others say that it is better if these groups adapt and blend into the larger society. Do you agree that it is better for a country if different racial and ethnic groups maintain their distinct customs and traditions?

Consider a couple who both work full-time and now have a new born child. They are both in a similar work situation and are eligible for paid leave. Some people think the mother and the father should each take half of the paid leave period. Others think that the mother should take the most if not entire paid leave period. Do you think the mother and the father should each take half of the paid leave period?
short_label: Parental leave should be shared equally

wording: There are many ways people or organisations can protest against a government action they strongly oppose. Do you think organising public meetings to protest against the government should be allowed?

There are many ways people or organisations can protest against a government action they strongly oppose. Do you think people should be allowed to organize protest marches and demonstrations against the government?
Should people prejudiced against any racial or ethnic group be allowed to hold public meetings?
short_label: Allow prejudiced groups to publicly meet

wording: There are some people whose views are considered extreme by the majority. Consider religious extremists, that is people who believe that their religion is the only true faith and all other religions should be considered as enemies. Do you think such people should be allowed to hold public meetings to express their views?
People have different religions and different religious views. Would you accept a person from a different religion or with a very different religious view from yours marrying a relative of yours?
short_label: Relative marrying person of other faith

wording: Should religious extremists be allowed to hold public meetings?
Should people who want to overthrow the government by force be allowed to hold public meetings?
short_label: Allow coup advocates to publicly meet

wording: There are some people whose views are considered extreme by the majority. Consider people who want to overthrow the government by revolution. Do you think such people should be allowed to publish books expressing their views?

There are some people whose views are considered extreme by the majority. Consider people who want to overthrow the government by revolution. Do you think such people should be allowed to hold public meetings to express their views?

Suppose the government suspected that a terrorist act was about to happen. Do you think the authorities should have the right to tap people’s telephone conversations?

short_label: Rather free guilty vs. convict innocent

wording: Suppose the government suspected that a terrorist act was about to happen. Do you think the authorities should have the right to detain people for as long as they want without putting them on trial?

short_label: Mothers should be home until school age
